Write-Up Text: Aussie citizens have taken to social media to express their opinions on the recently unveiled Federal Budget. The majority of people seem divided with some voicing their appreciation for the budget's provisions targeting the country's most vulnerable sections such as unemployment support and mental health care. Others seem unhappy with the budget's lack of attention to concerns over justice for First Nations' communities and the affordability of housing in several urban areas. The budget has sparked a heated political discussion with experts debating its impact on interest rates and migration.
